1.0.name: wordpress/rvw-add-link
1.0.description:
Add links to posts, pages, and custom post types.

An "Add Link" button is added to the editor to select the post, page or custom post type to link to. Links to external web pages can be used. A label for the link can be added.

Links are added as a shortcode.

Integrated help is included: just click the "help" tab at the top right of the screen.
